calculator.query-boolean: Query has boolean representation (1 = True, 0 = False)

misc.no-result-calculator-description: Try expressions like "10 euros to dollars", "sqrt(10) + 2 ^ 2.5", "20 cm to inches"
misc.no-result-time-description: Try expressions like "time +2 hours at Prague", "time until December"

errors.zero-division-error: Creating a black hole aren't we?
errors.zero-division-error-description: Looks like you divided by zero somewhere
errors.boolean-comparison-error: Complex numbers can't be inequally compared
errors.boolean-comparison-error-description: You tried to compare a complex number with another number. That's illegal
errors.currency-provider-error: Currency Provider error. Did you set your API key?
errors.currency-provider-error-description: Set your API key in the extension preferences
errors.date-overflow: Hey I'm not a time machine
errors.date-overflow-description: I can't calculate dates in 1 million years, or March 32
errors.boolean-percentage-error-description: You cannot compute percentages of boolean variables
errors.wrong-base-error-description: Input contains digits not valid for this base
errors.base-floating-error: Result is a floating point number
errors.base-floating-error-description: Floating point numbers cannot be safely converted to other bases
errors.missing-simpleeval-error: Looks like simpleeval is not installed
errors.missing-simpleeval-error-description: Install it with "/usr/bin/python3 -m pip install simpleeval" and restart launcher
errors.missing-parsedatetime-error: Looks like parsedatetime is not installed
errors.missing-parsedatetime-error-description: Install it with "/usr/bin/python3 -m pip install parsedatetime" and restart launcher
errors.missing-pint-error: Looks like pint is not installed
errors.missing-pint-error-description: Install it with "/usr/bin/python3 -m pip install pint" and restart launcher
